Name: Help! Someone is trapped in VIM!
StartPrompt: A fellow gooner is trapped in vim and is going to be late for their divorce hearing. What do?
Options: Tell them to accept that they live in VIM now
Conclusions: The pc bounces off the window because you're too feeble to smash the glass. It hits your fellow goon in the head and kills them. Nice one. Murderer.
The gooner looks at you in disbelief. Slowly acceptance spreads accross their face. They are truly a goon now.
